title: Tugboat powered by ammonia sails for the first time, showing how to cut emissions from shipping
description: A New York-based startup, Amogy, has successfully converted a 67-year-old diesel tugboat to run on cleanly-made ammonia, demonstrating a significant step towards zero-emissions maritime propulsion. This innovation aims to address the increasing carbon dioxide emissions from shipping, which account for about 3% of global emissions.
